title: INtopBackup
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: ADHD drugs may work indirectly to boost attention
items.description: Drugs like Adderall and Ritalin appear to help children with ADHD by activating brain areas involved in alertness and motivation.

items.title: New York blanketed in snowfall, sparking travel chaos
items.description: Hundreds of flights have been cancelled and more than 3,000 were delayed by the winter storm.

items.title: Major snow storms threaten holiday travel
items.description: The Northeast saw heavy snow on Friday, impacting holiday plans and causing flight delays and cancellations.

items.title: Nine arrested in Italy for allegedly raising millions for Hamas
items.description: Police say the suspects raised around €7m (£6m) for the militant group over more than two years.

items.title: Deadly storms slam Southern California
items.description: Record rainstorms drenched Southern California this week, leaving residents without power during the holidays.

items.title: Thousands without power in Kyiv after massive Russian attack
items.description: Authorities say a third of residents in the Ukrainian capital have been left without heating in freezing weather.

items.title: Thailand-Cambodia ceasefire begins after weeks of deadly clashes
items.description: Almost one million people were displaced when hostilities resumed earlier this month after the first truce broke.

items.title: Rescuers search for soccer coach, children after boat sinks in Indonesia
items.description: The Spanish soccer club Valencia said that a coach for its women's reserve team, Fernando Martín, and three of his children were among the victims.

items.title: Public release of Epstein records puts Ghislaine Maxwell under fresh scrutiny
New storm hitting waterlogged Southern California could bring mudslides and high surf
items.description: Another powerful storm system that could cause more flooding and mudslides is rolling across Southern California.
